data.text:
Wednesday, March 18th Thursday, March 19th Friday, March 20th Saturday, March 21st

Virtually any place that can hold a band (with or without a roof) has got something going on. While the action is focused on downtown, right around 6th Street, the whole city rocks, and here's our map of everywhere that's anywhere at SXSW 2009:

{snippet 5}
